text: Hausen is a community in the Miltenberg district in the region of Lower Franconia in Bavaria, Germany and a member of the Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (Administrative Community) of Kleinwallstadt. == Geography == === Place === Hausen is in the Bavarian Lower Main (Bayerischer Untermain) Region. The community only has the district of Hausen. == References == Category:Miltenberg (district)
title: Hausen, Miltenberg
